alert.note: Alert for Conecuh; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 03 at 3:28PM CST until February 03 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CST FOR NORTH CENTRAL ESCAMBIA AND SOUTHWESTERN CONECUH COUNTIES... At 328 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over I65 And AL 113, or 14 miles northwest of Brewton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Evergreen, I65 And AL 113 and I65 And US 84. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for south central Alabama. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
